text: is a Japanese female weightlifter, competing in the 58 kg category until 2018 and 59 kg starting in 20182018 World Weightlifting Championships –67 kg results after the International Weightlifting Federation reorganized the categories. ==Career== She has competed at six world championships, and the 2016 Summer Olympics. Most recently, she competed at the 2018 World Weightlifting Championships, winning a bronze medal in the Clean and Jerk portion of the competition. ==Major results== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! rowspan=2 width=40 | Year ! rowspan=2 width=250 | Venue ! rowspan=2 width=60 | Weight ! colspan=4 | Snatch (kg) ! colspan=4 | Clean & Jerk (kg) ! rowspan=2 width=40 | Total ! rowspan=2 width=40 | Rank |- ! width=40 | 1 ! width=40 | 2 ! width=40 | 3 ! width=40 | Rank ! width=40 | 1 ! width=40 | 2 ! width=40 | 3 ! width=40 | Rank |- ! colspan=13 | Olympic Games |- | 2016 || align=left | Rio de Janeiro, Brazil || 58 kg || 90 || ~~93~~ || 94 || 8 || 120 || 124 || ~~126~~ || 4 || 218 || 5 |- ! colspan=13|World Championships |- |2011 || align=left| Paris, France || 58 kg ||82||85|| ~~87~~ ||23||112||115||117||11||202||14 |- |2013 || align=left| Wrocław, Poland || 58 kg ||86||90|| ~~92~~ ||10||113||117|| ~~121~~ ||6||207||7 |- |2014 || align=left| Almaty, Kazakhstan || 58 kg ||87||89|| ~~91~~ ||16||116|| ~~119~~ ||119||6||208||8 |- |2015 || align=left| Houston, United States|| 58 kg ||90||93|| ~~95~~ ||11||120|| ~~123~~ || ~~123~~ ||10||213||8 |- | 2017 || align=left | Anaheim, United States || 58 kg || ~~93~~ || 93 || ~~95~~ || 7 || 123 || 126 || ~~130~~ || || 219 || 4 |- | 2018 || align=left | Ashgabat, Turkmenistan || 59 kg || 93 || ~~97~~ || ~~97~~ || 11 || 124 || 127 || 131 || || 224 || 5 |- |} ==References== ==External links== * * * * * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese female weightlifters Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Weightlifters at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Weightlifters at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic weightlifters of Japan Category:Asian Games medalists in weightlifting Category:Weightlifters at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Japan
